sense.def:
To organize an activity or event
pomeni pripraviti vse za neko dejavnost ali prireditev.

seg.quote: We organized a concert in the village hall.

sense.def:
To organize things
pomeni razvrstiti stvari v smiselni red.

seg.quote: He's better able now to organise his thoughts.
Papers are organized in enormous filing cabinets.

sense.def:
Kadar delavci ali uslužbenci
organize
, se zberejo v skupino, na primer sindikat, da bi imeli večjo moč.

seg.quote: Their poverty prevents them from organizing effectively to improve their wages.
